scripts.prepare: mustache ./config/${NETWORK:-ganache}.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/${NETWORK:-ganache}.json src/_config.template.yaml > src/_config.ts
scripts.deploy-remote: npm run codegen && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ${NAME:-null}
